name: Tabe-O-Ja
storyline: With your summoned Tabe-Gami, you can form your own original team, battle against rival chefs and their Tabe-Gami, and challenge the showdown of the cooking world: "World's Strongest Dish."
summary: Tabe-O-Ja is a cooking action game in which you can enjoy strategic battles. As the special chef "Tabe-O-Ja," you will cook various dishes including Japanese, western, Chinese, and more with Joy-Con cooking actions, and summon the "Tabe-Gami" that dwell within each tasty dish.
